short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classroom of the Elite Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Classroom of the Elite background. Classroom of the Elite theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Classroom of the Elite wallpapers with each new tab.
2. Customize your Classroom of the Elite background or set favorites in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. Note-taking feature for task management.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Option to explore More Themes.
12. Social media sharing made easy.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. Instant access to gaming portals.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Classroom of the Elite new tab.
